name: Gabriel does a thing
desc: My personal site, the one you're on right now, w/ a static blog, animation, modals, light & dark mode, and spotify connection.

name: Sightsee
desc: full stack vacation site with followable holiday destinations, user authentication with JSON web tokens, and a protected route.

name: Urban Viking
desc: E-comm site with shopping cart, sleek design and stripe checkout.

name: Str Blog
desc: A community blog site, with firebase user authentication, user profile page, editable markdown posts w/ live view, image uploading via firebase storage

name: Firestarter
desc: A kanban board w/ google and email login, draggable boards w/ color selection, responsive material design + a small angular universal ssr demo.

name: Firemart
desc: full stack online grocery shopping app, backend built w/ express & mongoDB, frontend hosted w/ firebase. Features custom user auth with JWT, admin authorization for CRUD operation including image upload, a real-time cart and printable invoices.

name: Bug Tracker
desc: A bug tracking app, GraphQL backend API, Postgres database managed with prisma. deploy coming soon.
